comment.body:
I doubt google will be overtaken as *best*
but duckduckgo is already at the same level imo

@Glightstar: ISO is a standards organisation, they publish standards on things...
like how your power outlets are supposed to work :v
I don't think twitter.com. has to exist, and there are resolvers *cough* systemd *cough* that can't resolve FQDN's.
